sentences.sContent: His blindness is the result of an accident.
sentences.sContent_eng: His blindness is the result of an accident.
sentences.sCn: 他的失明是一次事故造成的。

sentences.sContent: He wanted to prevent needless cases of blindness.

sentences.sCn: 他期望避免不必要的失明病例。

sentences.sContent: Defective mitochondria are passed down only from the mother. They can lead to brain damage, muscle wasting, heart failure and blindness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Defective mitochondria are passed down only from the mother. They can lead to brain damage, muscle wasting, heart failure and blindness.
sentences.sCn: 有缺陷的线粒体只会从母亲处遗传。它们会导致大脑损伤、肌肉萎缩、心力衰竭和失明。
